    "file_path": "h2q_project/quaternion_ops.py",
    "content": "import torch

def quaternion_conjugate(q):
    w, x, y, z = torch.unbind(q, dim=-1)
    return torch.stack((w, -x, -y, -z), dim=-1)


def quaternion_multiply(q1, q2):
    w1, x1, y1, z1 = torch.unbind(q1, dim=-1)
    w2, x2, y2, z2 = torch.unbind(q2, dim=-1)

    w = w1 * w2 - x1 * x2 - y1 * y2 - z1 * z2
    x = w1 * x2 + x1 * w2 + y1 * z2 - z1 * y2
    y = w1 * y2 - x1 * z2 + y1 * w2 + z1 * x2
    z = w1 * z2 + x1 * y2 - y1 * x2 + z1 * w2
    return torch.stack((w, x, y, z), dim=-1)


def quaternion_to_rotation_matrix(q):
    w, x, y, z = torch.unbind(q, dim=-1)
    
    # Normalize the quaternion to improve numerical stability
    q = q / torch.linalg.norm(q, dim=-1, keepdim=True)

    w, x, y, z = torch.unbind(q, dim=-1)

    xx = x * x
    yy = y * y
    zz = z * z
    xy = x * y
    xz = x * z
    yz = y * z
    xw = x * w
    yw = y * w
    zw = z * w

    row0 = torch.stack([1 - 2 * (yy + zz), 2 * (xy - zw), 2 * (xz + yw)], dim=-1)
    row1 = torch.stack([2 * (xy + zw), 1 - 2 * (xx + zz), 2 * (yz - xw)], dim=-1)
    row2 = torch.stack([2 * (xz - yw), 2 * (yz + xw), 1 - 2 * (xx + yy)], dim=-1)

    rot_matrix = torch.stack([row0, row1, row2], dim=-2)
    return rot_matrix


def rotation_matrix_to_quaternion(matrix):
    m00 = matrix[..., 0, 0]
    m01 = matrix[..., 0, 1]
    m02 = matrix[..., 0, 2]
    m10 = matrix[..., 1, 0]
    m11 = matrix[..., 1, 1]
    m12 = matrix[..., 1, 2]
    m20 = matrix[..., 2, 0]
    m21 = matrix[..., 2, 1]
    m22 = matrix[..., 2, 2]

    trace = m00 + m11 + m22
    
    quaternion = torch.empty(matrix.shape[:-2] + (4,), dtype=matrix.dtype, device=matrix.device)
    
    mask = trace > 0
    if mask.any():
        s = 0.5 / torch.sqrt(trace[mask] + 1.0)
        quaternion[mask, 0] = 0.25 / s
        quaternion[mask, 1] = (m21[mask] - m12[mask]) * s
        quaternion[mask, 2] = (m02[mask] - m20[mask]) * s
        quaternion[mask, 3] = (m10[mask] - m01[mask]) * s

    mask_x = (m00 > m11) & (m00 > m22) & ~mask
    if mask_x.any():
        s = torch.sqrt(1.0 + m00[mask_x] - m11[mask_x] - m22[mask_x]) * 2
        quaternion[mask_x, 0] = (m21[mask_x] - m12[mask_x]) / s
        quaternion[mask_x, 1] = 0.25 * s
        quaternion[mask_x, 2] = (m01[mask_x] + m10[mask_x]) / s
        quaternion[mask_x, 3] = (m02[mask_x] + m20[mask_x]) / s

    mask_y = (m11 > m22) & ~mask & ~mask_x
    if mask_y.any():
        s = torch.sqrt(1.0 + m11[mask_y] - m00[mask_y] - m22[mask_y]) * 2
        quaternion[mask_y, 0] = (m02[mask_y] - m20[mask_y]) / s
        quaternion[mask_y, 1] = (m01[mask_y] + m10[mask_y]) / s
        quaternion[mask_y, 2] = 0.25 * s
        quaternion[mask_y, 3] = (m12[mask_y] + m21[mask_y]) / s

    mask_z = ~mask & ~mask_x & ~mask_y
    if mask_z.any():
        s = torch.sqrt(1.0 + m22[mask_z] - m00[mask_z] - m11[mask_z]) * 2
        quaternion[mask_z, 0] = (m10[mask_z] - m01[mask_z]) / s
        quaternion[mask_z, 1] = (m02[mask_z] + m20[mask_z]) / s
        quaternion[mask_z, 2] = (m12[mask_z] + m21[mask_z]) / s
        quaternion[mask_z, 3] = 0.25 * s
    
    return quaternion
"
